entry.title: Teddy Day Facebook Fb Timeline Covers 2014
entry.content:
best Beautiful Collection On Happy Propose Day 2014 Poetry Poems in Hindi, English

Mujhe khamosh raahon me Tera saath chahiye,
Tanha hai mera hath tera hath chahiye,Mujh ko mere muqaddar par itna yakeen to hai,
Tujhko bhi mere lafz meri baat chahiye,
Main khud apni shayari ko kya achcha kahoon,
Mujh ko teri tareef teri daad chahiye,
Ehsaas-E-Mohabbat tere hi waste hai,
Lekin Junoon-E-Ishq ko teri har saugat chahiye,
Tu mujhko pane ki khwaaish rakhta hai sayad,
Lekin mujhe jeene ke liye teri hi zaat chahiye…


best Beautiful Collection On Happy Propose Day 2014 Poetry Poems in Hindi, English

**Teddy Day Facebook Fb Timeline Covers 2014**

I Ca’nt Live Any Moment Of Life Without You
I Consider The Life Is Uncomplete Without U
Every Second I Want To Be With You…
Happy Valentines Day My Love…
==================================

entry.title: Propose Day Hindi, English Sms Messages 2014
entry.content:
best Girlfriend, Husband | Wife.. Express Your Feelings with Love Poetry, Poems

I am pretty sure that…
Eating chocolate…
Keeps wrinkles away…
Coz I’h nvr seen a 10 year old…
With a Hershey bar & crows feet….


best Girlfriend, Husband | Wife.. Express Your Feelings with Love Poetry, Poems

A Kiss is alovely trick designed by nature, to stop speech whaen words become superfluous

Propose Day Hindi, English Sms Messages 2014

Kaisi Beeti Raat Kissi Se Mat Kehna
Sapnon Wali Baat Kissi Se Mat Kehna
Kaisay Uthay Badaal Or Kahan Takray
Kaisi Hui Barsaat Kissi Se Mat Kehna
~
Sameer +92 300 2711 588

entry.title: Hot Girl 14th Febraury Valentines Day Text Greetings Messages Quotes
entry.content:
best English'

Kabhi Na Dil Dukhao Gay
Aj Promise Day Hai apne Pyar Se Kro Wada Keh
Kabhi Na dil dukhao Gay, Kabhi Na Chhor K Jao Gay
Us K Gham Mein Sog Khushi Mein Muskurao Gay
Har cheez Se Bahd K Sirf Usi Ko chaho Gay
Kro Wada or Pa Lo Us Ki Muhabbat
Happy Promise Day 2014


best English'

Happy Teddy Bear Day …
“”At sales every other toy looks simply worn,
dilapidated, grubby
A bear looks lost & abandoned
& desperately in need of a loving home.””

entry.title: Best Collection On Happy Propose Day Sms In Hindi 2014
entry.content:
best A Brand New Collection On 14th Febraury Valentines Day Text Greetings, Messages Quotes

You Are The Cause Of Living For Me
You Are All That I Have Longed For
You Have Made My Dreams Come True.
There Is No greater gift to have
Than being loved by you.

best A Brand New Collection On 14th Febraury Valentines Day Text Greetings, Messages Quotes

You are so especial to me.
There is nothing better than
Having you as a friend to share each day with !
Thank you for making my day brighter
HUGS>>>


Best Collection On Happy Propose Day Sms In Hindi 2014

A Valentine is nothing like
A chocolate or a rose.
For in a week these shall be gone,
But Valentines remain.
If love were always sweet to tongue
Or fragrant to the nose,
Each day would be like Valentine’s,
And we would go insane.

* Happy Valentines Day 2013 SMS Wishes In Thai

entry.title: 12th February Kiss Day Text Greetings, Quotes, Messages
entry.content:
best Propose Day 2014 Quotes, Sayings

  • Valentines Day Tamil SMS Wishes 2013

best Propose Day 2014 Quotes, Sayings

**12th February Kiss Day Text Greetings, Quotes, Messages**

Such meek
Little tokens
Sugary white,
Shy green, prom
Yellow and pink.
But spiced with
Mottoes: SURE
THING, OH BOY—
Each one like
A reckless wink.
===============================
